infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: ProofVid needs access to your camera to record videos for authentication.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: ProofVid needs access to your microphone to record audio with videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: ProofVid needs access to your photo library to save authenticated videos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: ProofVid needs permission to save authenticated videos to your photo library.
